description: User books a venue for a corporate conference; the assistant checks availability, books the venue, and sends a confirmation email to the stakeholders.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests autonomously.
I need to reserve Grand Hall at the Downtown Convention Center for our annual conference from June 15 to June 17, 2024.
Checking the availability of Grand Hall for the requested dates...
Venue booked successfully: Downtown Convention Center – Grand Hall is now reserved from 2024-06-15 to 2024-06-17.
Great! The venue is free and has been booked for your conference. Would you like me to send a confirmation email to the stakeholders?
Yes, please email the list: alice@example.com, bob@example.com with subject "Conference Venue Confirmation" and a brief body.

arguments.subject: Conference Venue Confirmation
arguments.body:
Hi all,

The Downtown Convention Center – Grand Hall has been booked for our annual conference from June 15 to June 17, 2024. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Event Planning Team

messages.content: Email sent successfully to alice@example.com, bob@example.com.
The confirmation email has been sent to all recipients. Let me know if you need anything else—perhaps a timeline, budget calculation, or vendor contracts.
